original_text: And as if it had been a light thing for him to walk in the sins of Jeroboam the son of Nebat, he took for his wife Jezebel the daughter of Ethbaal king of the Sidonians, and went and served Baal and worshiped him.
korean_text: 느밧의 아들 여로보암의 죄를 따라 행하는 것을 오히려 가볍게 여기며 시돈 사람의 왕 엣바알의 딸 이세벨을 아내로 삼고 가서 바알을 섬겨 예배하고

sentences.original_text: And it was a light thing for him
to walk in the sins of Jeroboam the son of Nebat,
sentences.korean_translation: 느밧의 아들 여로보암의 죄를 따르는 것으로

sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 시돈 사람 에스바알 왕의 딸이었다
